title: Liverpool embarrassed by Brentford in Premier League race

Key stats (provided by ESPN Stats & Information)
Casemiro: 2nd goal with Manchester United (22 games). With Real Madrid, he did not score his first goal in any competition until his 50th game (all comps).
Up next
AFC Bournemouth: The Cherries will shift focus to the FA Cup when they host Burnley on Saturday, Jan. 7 at 10 a.m. ET. Then they head to Brenford for Premier League action on Saturday, Jan. 14.
Liverpool: The Reds switch gears to the FA Cup when they host Wolverhampton in the third round of the competition on Saturday, Jan. 7 at 3 p.m. ET. Then Liverpool return to Premier League action when they travel to face Brighton & Hove Albion on Saturday, Jan. 14 at 10 a.m. ET.
